name: Extension-ImageCoordinates-1
description: An Extension to record a reference to an image and co-ordinates including X, Y and Z co-ordinates of a location within an image.

element.short: An Extension to record a reference to an image and co-ordinates including X, Y and Z co-ordinates of a location within an image.
element.definition: An Extension to record a reference to an image and co-ordinates including X, Y and Z co-ordinates of a location within an image.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: xml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
element.comment: Note that FHIR strings may not exceed 1MB in size

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.short: Additional Content defined by implementations
element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.short: The URI of the image that is being referred to
element.definition: The URI of the image that is being referred to. Can be any kind of image file (jPeg, Dicom etc.).
element.comment: A stream of bytes, base64 encoded

element.short: xCoordinate - a count of pixels from the origin (left) of the image as a rectangle

element.comment: A stream of bytes, base64 encoded
